reproduce the bug, please attach.
Could you please attach the source file that is causing the problem?

I'm using jdk 1.4.2_06.
The workspace includes several projects, most of the time only one of them is
opened, and each one of the projects includes >10,100 files.
I don't know which java class causes this problem, but it happens event when
saving xml file within the project, and also when before running external tools.
This problem does not happen on 3.1M3 with the same workspace.

Problem occurs on line:

new String[]{ new String(castedExpressionType.readableName()), new
String(castExpression.resolvedType.readableName()), new
String(parameterType.readableName())},

suspecting castExpression.resolvedType to be null.

The offending source file should carry a problem (in problem view) located on
line 1, and its message should correspond to the stack trace you found in the log.
Please reopen when steps to reproduce are available
